sayfalar:
My Day

I am a student. I am in my room. There is a bed, a table, and a chair. My computer is on the table.

I take my bag. I have a pen and a pencil. I open the door. The sun is hot. I walk to school.

I see my teacher. I love my class. I am very happy.

In the evening, I run home. I look out the window. I see the moon. I am not sad. I go to sleep.
